attributes.action: Pull Our Troops Out of Iraq
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Intervention in Iraq has failed. Our presence, along with the United States has inflamed internal tensions which have resulted in civil war, hundreads of thousands of Iraqi civilian deaths  as well as the deaths of our troops. We petition for the immediate removal of our troops. We believe that this is the best course of action for the Iraqi people who, will be able to form their own government, in their own vision, and live in peace without the continued interference by the UK and USA.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
